coastal.name: Laguna
coastal.description: A popular tourist destination located in Orange County, Laguna Beach is known for its stunning coves, crystal-clear waters, and thriving arts scene.

coastal.name: La Jolla
coastal.description: A charming coastal community located just north of San Diego, La Jolla is known for its beautiful beaches, world-class dining, and stunning ocean views.

coastal.name: Malibu
coastal.description: Home to some of the most beautiful and pristine beaches in Southern California, Malibu is a popular destination for surfers, hikers, and beach-goers alike.

coastal.name: New Port
coastal.description: Located in Orange County, Newport Beach is a picturesque seaside town with a bustling harbor and miles of sandy beaches.

coastal.name: Santa Monica
coastal.description: Located just west of Los Angeles, Santa Monica is known for its famous pier, sandy beaches, and oceanfront dining options.
